short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension changes the typography on UK legislation to make it more visually appealing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official typeface of UK statute's used by the King's Printer is Book Antiqua Parliamentary.  This extension uses a public clone of that typeface to make legislation and Hansard look as His Majesty's printer intended.
